The '''Dendroculus''' (plural '''Dendroculi''') is an Adventure Item that can be found scattered across [[Sumeru]]. Dendroculi can be offered to any [[Statue of The Seven]] in Sumeru for rewards, are limited and do not respawn, can only be found in the overworld, and will not appear in [[Chests]].

When an overworld Dendroculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use a [[Dendroculus Resonance Stone]] to mark the location of a Dendroculus on the map.

271 Dendroculi can be found in the overworld, allowing a player to fully level up the Statues of The Seven in Sumeru with one Dendroculus to spare.
